      • composeDeviceSpecificCss

        public java.lang.String composeDeviceSpecificCss(OutputDevice outputDevice)
        Output the default CSS joint with the device CSS. Also inserts basic comments.
        Parameters:
        outputDevice - | The device, for which the CSS shall be selected.
        Returns:
        Complete CSS string including comments
